name: testSuite(_:didFailWithDescription:inFile:atLine:)
desc: Notifies the observer when a test suite reports a failure.DeprecatedUse testSuite(_:didRecord:) instead. If you implement both this method and testSuite(_:didRecord:), the test will not call this method.
declaration:
optional func testSuite(_ testSuite: XCTestSuite, 
 didFailWithDescription description: String, 
                 inFile filePath: String?, 
                 atLine lineNumber: Int)
